data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 3, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Mazatlan pushes forward through Luis Mendoza, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan take a 0-1 lead thanks to Luis Mendoza.
Fernando Aristeguieta instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Mazatlan.
Camilo Sanvezzo scores with a header and the away team increase their lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Martin Rodriguez.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicolas Ibanez of San Luis smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
San Luis takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 15, Nicolas Ibanez (San Luis) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
San Luis are pushing forward but Jorge Sanchez's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 17, Free kick Mazatlan.
Goal! Camilo Sanvezzo extends Mazatlan lead to 0-3 with a header.
Luis Mendoza with an assist there.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 23, German Berterame (San Luis) gets a yellow card.
San Luis takes a corner from the right.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Mazatlan take a comfortable 0-4 lead thanks to Fernando Aristeguieta.
Great play from Camilo Sanvezzo to set up the goal.
Camilo Mayada (San Luis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Mazatlan.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
San Luis's Nicolas Ibanez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo has run offside.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, San Luis to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Goal! Mazatlan extend their lead to 0-5 through Camilo Sanvezzo.
Martin Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 44, Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Pablo Barrera is on a sub for Camilo Mayada for San Luis.
Mauro Quiroga is replacing Anderson Julio for the home team.
San Luis make their third substitution with Juan Castro replacing Pablo Lopez.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Ramiro Gonzalez with Rodrigo Noya.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Mazatlan.
In the minute 48, Free kick San Luis.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Fernando Aristeguieta is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 52, Mazatlan's Fernando Aristeguieta is back in action after a slight knock.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 55, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
San Luis's Pablo Barrera misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 58, San Luis are coming forward and German Berterame gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
San Luis drives forward and Pablo Barrera gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Jorge Sanchez of San Luis gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in San Luis.
Cesar Huerta is replacing Luis Mendoza for the away team.
Rodrigo Millar is on a sub for Fernando Aristeguieta for Mazatlan.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jose Ortiz for Mazatlan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 70, San Luis are coming forward and German Berterame gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Mazatlan's Cesar Huerta is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Jose Ortiz is back on his feet again.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of San Luis.
Camilo Sanvezzo of Mazatlan gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 77, San Luis takes a corner from the left.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Camilo Sanvezzo with Miguel Sansores.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 80, Mazatlan make their fourth substitution with Gonzalo Jara replacing Martin Rodriguez.
Mazatlan make their fifth substitution with Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal replacing Israel Jimenez.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 87, San Luis pushes forward through Matias Catalan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nicolas Diaz (Mazatlan) has received a first yellow card.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-5.
